buginformation.summary: zip compressor input stream reads fewer bytes from truncated file than python implementation
buginformation.description: jython includes support for decompressing files using commons compress and shares regression tests with cpython the cpython test test read truncated test passes under cpython but fails under jython the bzip 2compressorinputstream able read 769 bytes from the truncated data rather than the 770 bytes that the cpython implementation can read
